price: Isaan kafaran gariin isaanii jaalallee gariiti. Yoo isin isa (mu’uminoota jaallattanii kaafiroota jibbuu) hojjachuu baattan dachii keessatti balaa (shirkii)fi badii guddaatu argama.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٍۚ إِلَّا تَفۡعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتۡنَةٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَفَسَادٞ كَبِيرٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū baʿḍuhum awliyāu baʿḍin illā tafʿalūhu takun fit'natun fī al-arḍi wafasādun kabīrun
